entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Gjoa Haven
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:25 PM MST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Haze, -33.7°C

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 39 with temperature rising to minus 31 by morning. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries overnight. Blowing snow overnight. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h early this evening then north 40 gusting to 60 after midnight. Low minus 39 with temperature rising to minus 31 by morning. Wind chill minus 57 this evening and minus 50 overnight. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 2:00 PM MST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 30. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries. Blowing snow. Wind north 40 km/h gusting to 60. Temperature steady near minus 30. Wind chill near minus 50. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 2:00 PM MST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 31. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries in the evening. Blowing snow early in the evening. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60. Low minus 31. Wind chill minus 48 in the evening and minus 43 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 2:00 PM MST Friday 27 January 2023
